function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 misinformation","Impact":"Increased risk of misinformation leading to incorrect beliefs and behaviors","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking processes and promote reliable sources of information","Technologies":"Social media algorithms for fact-checking and identification of misinformation","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Social media platforms, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Cyberchondria related to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased anxiety and stress due to excessive health-related internet searches","Mitigation":"Promote digital health literacy and provide access to credible health information","Technologies":"Health information portals, educational campaigns on digital health literacy","People":"Internet users, individuals seeking health information online","Owner":"Health organizations, educational institutions, internet service providers"},{"Description":"Cognitive load and sharing unverified COVID-19 information","Impact":"Spread of unverified information on social media leading to incorrect beliefs and behaviors","Mitigation":"Implement cognitive load reduction techniques and promote critical evaluation of information","Technologies":"Social media algorithms for content evaluation, cognitive load reduction tools","People":"Social media users, general public","Owner":"Social media platforms, educational institutions"}]}
